entry.title: what do you think all them saddles and boots was about?
entry.summary:
Author: mikeypee123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,209Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: “Can I come with you?” Buck blurts outEddie stares at him with wide eyes, “What?”“To the ranch,” Buck answers, “You said they pay good, and I really want to get out of that bar.” He smiles at Eddie, a silent plea. “I want to help you,” he confesses, finally.Eddie's face curls up in confusion. “You don't know me,” he retorts.title from "Cowboys Are Frequently Secretly Fond of Each Other " by Willie Nelsonbuddie rancher / ranchhand fic :3

entry.title: Fuck Everything
entry.summary:
Author: isthatacatsherlock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,079Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: “You haven’t been weird yet,” Buck said, and it was curious that maybe the most embarrassing thing that can happen in front of a hot guy had happened and here he was, getting closer, not changing his number. He was, instead, leaning towards him, holding his hand. “Like, about how you found me. Still contemplating leaving town and changing my name, personally.”“What about it do you think would weird me out?”“I don’t know, the blood?”“I think I’ve lost the ability to phased by blood. You spend enough time in combat medicine and it stops being gross or alarming. It’s just something that happens. Are you embarrassed that it was menstrual blood?”“Ugh- yeah. I know you know the terms and you’re a professional, but don’t say that word.”

entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,367Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 681

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

Author: bisexual_disaster_118

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,213Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: “Why didn’t you call me, Buck? Why did you wait so long? I had to hear from Tommy fucking Kinard that Bobby died. Our Captain, your… we all know he was so much more than just Cap to you. Why didn’t you let me be there for you? I should have been there.”— — — — — —Bobby is gone. entry.title: Love From the Other Side
entry.summary:
Author: betweensaintsandsinners

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,066Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Buck nodded to himself, the clicking of the keyboard a soft lull as he worked on editing his photos. It was almost comforting sound, like rain against glass, softly pattering as it fell. The silence lingered between them, but it wasn’t uncomfortable or heavy. Every now and then, Buck would pause to take a drink of water or he could hear Eddie’s quiet movements, but neither of them moved from their spots against the wall, making sure the other could hear them in the vent if they were to speak.After around three or four minutes, Eddie was the one who broke the silence, his voice thicker with sleep. Buck wasn’t even sure if the man was fully awake now. “We should probably try and get some sleep, I have to take Chris to school in the morning and then a shift. What do you say we do this again tomorrow night? Same place and time?”—————————Or an AU where Eddie is still a firefighter for the LAFD and has trouble sleeping at night, his neighbor Buck is a photographer with social anxiety who likes to stay inside most of the time.The vent between their apartments allow them to talk late at night when neither can sleep.

entry.title: Crawling Back
entry.summary:
Author: not-blonde-yet (stillredhead_just_tired)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,812Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 32

Summary: “It’s not fair that I’m called Robbie,” Robbie blurts out.Bobby raises an eyebrow. “What do you mean?”“You, Brook, and Buck are all Bs. I’m an R.”Buck swallows a laugh. “Actually, You is a Y.”Robbie scoffs. “You is a idiot.”Buck’s eyes twinkle. “You are an idiot. Offend me all you want, sure –but don’t commit war crimes against grammar.”“Language,” Bobby says, sharply, though there’s no real heat in it.Brook tilts her head, totally unbothered. “...Technically, he was correcting language.”
